item.title: Config type cheking
item.description: Config type cheking Global En vs code f1 setting > prefernces: open settings (json) “javascript.implicitProjectConfig.checkJs”: true (decapricated) usar “js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.checkJs”: true Local En el archivo donde quieras hacer la comprobacion. //@ts-check

item.title: jsdoc.json
item.description: jsdoc.json Next.js { "source": { "include": [ "pages", "components", "lib" ], "includePattern": ".js$", "excludePattern": "(node_modules|docs)" }, "plugins": [ "plugins/markdown", "jsdoc-http-plugin", "node_modules/better-docs/component", "node_modules/better-docs/category" ], "templates": { "cleverLinks": true, "monospaceLinks": true, "better-docs": { "name": "My React components" } }, "tags": { "allowUnknownTags": ["component","category"] }, "opts": { "recurse": true, "destination": "./docs", "template": "node_modules/better-docs", "tutorials": "./tutorials", "readme": "./README.md" } } Basic { "source": { "include": ["src"], "includePattern": ".js$", "excludePattern": "(node_modules|docs)" }, "plugins": [ "plugins/markdown" ], "templates": { "cleverLinks": true, "monospaceLinks": true }, "opts": { "recurse": true, "destination": ".
